mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(brd_seq, brd_title, brd_content, brd_file, brd_date, user_id, brd_cnt, brd_likes) values(tbl_board_seq.nextval,#{brd_title},#{brd_content},#{brd_file}, sysdate, #{user_id}, 1, #{brd_likes})
mapper.select: select u.user_name, b.brd_title, b.brd_date from tbl_board b, tbl_user u where b.user_id = u.user_id
mapper.update: update tbl_help set help_content=#{help_content} where help_seq=#{help_seq}
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_name, h.help_seq, h.help_content from tbl_help h, tbl_user u where u.user_id = h.user_id and h.help_seq=#{help_seq}
